Question
========
A box, of mass $M$, is suspended by a string from the ceiling inside an elevator.
The elevator is moving upward, but slowing down. The tension in the string is

Answerlist
----------
* less than $Mg$.
* equal to $Mg$.
* greater than $Mg$.
* zero.

Solution
========
The elevator is accelerating downward, so the tension is less than $Mg$.
